overview: When the dead body of a young co-ed is found haven been beaten and brutalized, the small town isn't ready to panic, until a second body is found. A skillful and creative serial killer is on the loose, hell bent on creating havoc and fear. It's a psychopath orchestrating his deadly game of cat and mouse, with young co-eds as the pawns, against a cop broken with his addiction to pills and booze. Written by Jodie Jones
tagline: A psychopathic killer. A self destructive cop. A terrorized town in need.
title: Punishment
